posts.postText: It's free till level 20, anyone play it?
I played it for 3 years. It sucks away money lie a bitch.
Eh, get the 20 lvl trial, you can keep making characters and keep playing, its a steal really...

>> Eh, get the 20 lvl trial, you can keep making characters and keep playing, its a steal really...â€‰
Um... ok. The game really didn't get good until you reached the level cap though when I played. The first 20 levels might be fun though I haven't tried the new ones, they usually try to make the starting zones pretty good. It's a fun game if you have money to spare and if you have friends to play it with, it's a lot better.

Yeah, I play it. 
Idk what you would do before 20... levelling is kind of boring after a while....

Like Destar said, end game is where it really begins, and I'm probably xferring my main toon so I can play with a friend...
playing with friends is really a lot more fun.
I basically just play it for endgame PvP, but I do admit paying monthly does suck.

However, I got a job recently and I pay biyearly, so like.. 80 bucks for 6 months isn't terrible.
